description.tooltip: Bases de données qui ont des options problématiques
description.label: Bases problématiques

queries.query: SELECT db.[name] AS [Database Name], db.is_auto_create_stats_on, db.is_auto_update_stats_on, db.is_read_committed_snapshot_on, db.is_auto_shrink_on, db.is_auto_close_on FROM sys.databases AS db WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sys.dm_os_performance_counters AS lu WITH (NOLOCK) ON db.name = lu.instance_name INNER JOIN sys.dm_os_performance_counters AS ls WITH (NOLOCK) ON db.name = ls.instance_name WHERE lu.counter_name LIKE N'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)%' AND ls.counter_name LIKE N'Log File(s) Size (KB)%' AND ls.cntr_value > 0 AND (db.is_auto_create_stats_on = 0 OR db.is_auto_update_stats_on = 0 OR db.is_read_committed_snapshot_on = 1 OR db.is_auto_shrink_on = 1 OR db.is_auto_close_on = 1 ) ORDER BY [Database Name] OPTION (RECOMPILE);
